arts.ttl: The stats that show Arsenal can nullify Haaland
arts.sum: Erling Haaland is once again in red-hot form and appears unstoppable as he pushes towards another Premier League Golden Boot. The Norwegian forward has developed a reputation for scoring in virtually every circumstance, even when Manchester City fall short collectively. His relentless output has made him their most decisive figure this season, underlined by his […] The post The stats that show Arsenal can nullify Haaland appeared first on Just Arsenal News.

arts.ttl: Arsenal Predicted Lineup vs. Man City: Saliba Returns, Saka Still Missing
arts.sum: Arsenal are aiming to secure their third successive victory since the international break.

arts.ttl: Man City Predicted Lineup vs. Arsenal: All-Star Attack Primed for Title Test
arts.sum: Manchester City have failed to win any of their previous five clashes with Arsenal.

arts.ttl: Guardiola forced to make late decision on Rodri inclusion ahead of Arsenal clash
arts.sum: The decision on whether to put Rodri into the Manchester City line-up against Arsenal will come with late notice after the Ballon d’Or winner felt ‘uncomfortable’ in training before their opening Champions League game against Napoli on Thursday, according to manager Pep Guardiola. “Wednesday for example, the training session, he didn’t feel comfortable, he didn’t train good but said ‘no, no, I’ll be fine tomorrow’ and played extraordinarily, like Rodri is.

arts.ttl: Owen Hargreaves says he will be shocked if 'extraordinary' player doesn't start for Arsenal vs Man City
'Pick them off' - How Arsenal can play into Gyokeres's hands against Man City
arts.sum: Arsenal can play into Viktor Gyokeres's hands against Manchester City on Sunday and will not fear defeat against their former perpetual nemesis, Charles Watts has told Sports Mole.

arts.ttl: Gabriel Martinelli will now be crucial for Arsenal against Manchester City as huge Pep Guardiola weakness revealed
Arsenal vs Man City injury, suspension list, predicted XIs
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the team news for both Arsenal and Manchester City ahead of their Premier League clash on Sunday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Pre-Match Analysis: Arsenal host Manchester City
arts.sum: Arsenal welcome Manchester City to the Emirates in a blockbuster Premier League clash that could shape the title race. A 2-0 Champions League win away at Athletic Club Bilbao, where super-subs Gabriel Martinelli and Leandro Trossard changed the game with goals and assists.

arts.ttl: Pre-Match Analysis: Man City travel to take on Arsenal
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola’s side, however, arrive in strong form after back-to-back clean sheets and two statement wins — a 3-0 demolition of Manchester United in the derby and a solid 2-0 Champions League victory over Napoli, handing the Italian champions their first defeat of the campaign. Manchester City travel to the Emirates to face Arsenal in a massive Premier League showdown that could shape the early title race.
